title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 146.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 146.1 - Application

State Regulations

These guidelines establish qualifications
and training throughout the State for mediators and neutral evaluators serving
on court rosters. These guidelines are not intended to cover arbitrators nor to
apply to neutrals serving in the UCS Community Dispute Resolution Centers

Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
146.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
